    void removeFromFirstLeader​(int[] costo, int type)
    method that removes resources from the first depotLevelLeader until the cost is paid or the depot is empty the method expects to be called only if the depot has already been acquired (the leader card han been played by the client)

    method that adds all the resources it can inside a depot and decreases the resources array. used inside the IncreaseResources

    method that checks if the cost can be paid (if not throws a NotEnoughResources exception), if it can be paid it pays the cost

  • Method Details

    • addLeader

      public void addLeader​(TypeOfResource resource)

    • swapLevels

      public boolean swapLevels​(int index1, int index2)
      method that swaps levels, return false if it can't be done, or true after the swap is done
      Parameters:
      index1 - an integer between 1-3
      index2 - an integer between 1-3
      Returns:
      true if action done, false otherwise

    • getLevel

      public DepotLevel getLevel​(int index)
      Parameters:
      index - an integer between 1-3 representing the level
      Returns:
      level required

    • checkDifferentTypes

      public boolean checkDifferentTypes()

    • IncreaseResources

      public int IncreaseResources​(int[] originalCost, ClientHandler client)
      method that handles all the required actions when gaining resources from the marble market
      Parameters:
      originalCost - resources gained:
      [0]-> number of coins,
      [1]-> number of servants,
      [2]-> number of shields,
      [3]-> number of stones
      client - it's used to start a client communication if the resources need a new level where to be stored, refer to the ClientHandler.handleNotStoredResources method for additional info

    • addToFirstLeaderDepot

      public void addToFirstLeaderDepot​(int[] resources, int resourcetype)
      add resources to the first leader (if it's obtained)
      Parameters:
      resources - array of resources gained from the marble market
      resourcetype - type of resource of the leadertype

    • addToSecondLeaderDepot

      public void addToSecondLeaderDepot​(int[] resources, int resourcetype)
      add resources to the second leader (if it's obtained)
      Parameters:
      resources - array of resources gained from the marble market
      resourcetype - type of resource of the leadertype

    • seekerOfResource

      public DepotLevel seekerOfResource​(TypeOfResource resource)
      method that returns a Level if the resource of that type is already stored somewhere, null if it's not present.
      Parameters:
      resource - resource seeked
      Returns:
      level where the resource is stored, null if it's not present in the storage

    • conversionToArray

      public int[] conversionToArray()
      returns an int[4] with the quantity of resources stored in the storage.
      Returns:
      conversion of the total content of the storage in the standardized array version

    • canPay

      public boolean canPay​(int[] cost)
      given a cost this method checks if it can be paid with the resources stored in the storage.
      Parameters:
      cost - cost of the resources to be paid
      Returns:
      true if can pay, false otherwise

    • ResourceDecreaser

      public void ResourceDecreaser​(int[] cost) throws NotEnoughResources
      method that checks if the cost can be paid (if not throws a NotEnoughResources exception), if it can be paid it pays the cost
      Parameters:
      cost - cost that is going to be paid
      Throws:
      NotEnoughResources - when the player cannot pay the cost given

    • removeFromDepot

      public void removeFromDepot​(int typeOfResource, int[] costo) throws NotEnoughResources
      method that should be used only inside the resourceDecreaser method to decrease a resource in a depot. Additionally the controller SHOULD verify that all the resources can be paid.
      Parameters:
      typeOfResource - type of resource that should be decreased
      costo - cost as an int array
      Throws:
      NotEnoughResources - THIS SHOULD NOT BE THROWN, SINCE THROWING THIS MEANS THAT AN ILLEGAL ACTION HAS POSSIBLY HAPPENED, JUST HERE TO VERIFY THAT IT WON'T HAPPEN

    • resourceAdder

      public void resourceAdder​(DepotLevel temp, int[] resources, int typeOfResource)
      method that adds all the resources it can inside a depot and decreases the resources array. used inside the IncreaseResources
      Parameters:
      temp - pointer to the depot
      resources - array of gained resources
      typeOfResource - type of resource, used to select the right slot of the array

    • EmptyDepot

      public boolean EmptyDepot()
      method that checks of a level is empty
      Returns:
      true if at least one level is empty, false otherwise

    • storageStatus

      public int[][] storageStatus()
      method that creates a readable state for the view. it's used inside the GameStateUpdate and PlayerUpdate Class
      Returns:
      int[5][2] representing the status of the storage, refer to the PlayerUpdate class to understand how it can be read

    • transferToLeaderDepots

      public void transferToLeaderDepots()
      transfer all resources available to the depotlevelLeader of that type, if there is any, until either one is full or empty.

    • getFirstLeader

      public DepotLevelLeader getFirstLeader()

    • setFirstLeader

      public void setFirstLeader​(DepotLevelLeader firstLeader)

    • getSecondLeader

      public DepotLevelLeader getSecondLeader()

    • setSecondLeader

      public void setSecondLeader​(DepotLevelLeader secondLeader)

    • removeFromFirstLeader

      public void removeFromFirstLeader​(int[] costo, int type)
      method that removes resources from the first depotLevelLeader until the cost is paid or the depot is empty the method expects to be called only if the depot has already been acquired (the leader card han been played by the client)
      Parameters:
      costo - array of cost
      type - type of resource (int version of the leader resourceType)

    • removeFromSecondLeader

      public void removeFromSecondLeader​(int[] costo, int type)
      method that removes resources from the second depotLevelLeader until the cost is paid or the depot is empty the method expects to be called only if the depot has already been acquired (the leader card han been played by the client)
      Parameters:
      costo - array of cost
      type - type of resource (int version of the leader resourceType)

    • emptyStatus

      public boolean[] emptyStatus()
      returns boolean vector containing true if the corrisponding depotLevel is empty, false otherwise
      Returns:
      boolean vector containing the emptyStatus of the storage

    • setNewResourceToDepot

      public void setNewResourceToDepot​(int level, TypeOfResource type, int resource, int[] resources)
      method called when a handleNotStoredResources method from clientHandler is "working". It sets the level selected by the client to the resource type that was being handled and it stores all the resources available until either the level is full or the resources are 0
      this method is only called during the IncreaseResources method
      Parameters:
      level - level selected by the client
      type - type of resource that was being handled
      resource - int type of that resource
      resources - array of resources generated in the IncreaseResources method

    • updateTotalResourcesWithLeaders

      public void updateTotalResourcesWithLeaders​(int[] resourcesATM)

    • IncreaseResources

      public int IncreaseResources​(int[] originalCost)

    • AutoAdder

      public void AutoAdder​(int[] resources, boolean[] NullLevel)
